statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND compliance_rating = 'Average';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc' AND compliance_rating = 'Good';
DELETE FROM assessment_details WHERE control_id = 100 AND control_status = 'Completed';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE company_name = 'Example Company';
DELETE FROM assessment_answers WHERE detail_id IN (SELECT detail_id FROM assessment_details WHERE assessment_id = 1);
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_assessments WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_details WHERE detail_id IN (SELECT detail_id FROM compliance_details WHERE task_id = 3);
